title: Net impact of AI on jobs positive, managing the transition to new tech a challenge: RBI
description: Reserve Bank Deputy Governor Poonam Gupta stated that artificial intelligence will have a net positive impact on employment, despite job losses in some sectors. A recent RBI survey indicates significant productivity gains from AI, with no negative employment effects observed currently. The primary challenge lies in managing the transition for the labor market.
content:

title: Pivotal month of February
description: OUT of curiosity, I tested the expertise of the AI (artificial intelligence) research service of Google and Wikipedia by posing a question on why the month of February has figured frequently as a time of pivotal events in Filipino history. To my surprise, it produced a detailed response to my query within seconds, saying “February has been a month of transformative shifts in Philippine history, most notably the peaceful overthrow of a 20-year dictatorship and the outbreak of the Filipino-American War.”
content: OUT of curiosity, I tested the expertise of the AI (artificial intelligence) research service of Google and Wikipedia by posing a question on why the month of February has figured frequently as a time of pivotal events in Filipino history. To my surp... [2999 chars]

title: AI-Driven Rotation Deals Stock Hedge Funds Worst Day in Months
description: The turmoil unleashed in stocks this week by worries about the impact of artificial intelligence has rattled a slew of hedge fund strategies that had been enjoying a strong start to 2026.
content:

title: Amazon sees 50% boost to capital spending this year, shares tumble
description: AMAZON on Thursday projected a surge of more than 50 percent in capital expenditures (capex) this year, joining its peers in a spending spree to build out artificial intelligence (AI) infrastructure, and sending its shares down 11.5 percent in after-hours trading.

title: Reddit forecasts strong revenue as AI tools drive ad sales
description: REDDIT forecast first-quarter revenue above analysts' estimates on Thursday, as artificial intelligence-powered enhancements to its ad platform help the social media platform draw more marketers.

title: Thomson Reuters reports fourth-quarter revenue rise, shares slip
description: NEW YORK — Thomson Reuters reported higher fourth-quarter (Q4) revenue on Thursday, boosted by its legal, tax and accounting, and corporate businesses, as investors assess the impact of artificial intelligence (AI) companies moving into its key markets.

title: Net impact of AI on jobs positive, managing the transition to new tech a challenge: RBI
description: Amid widespread worries over the impact of artificial intelligence on jobs, Reserve Bank Deputy Governor Poonam Gupta on Friday said the net impact of the new technology on employment will be a positive one.

title: Senator Gatchalian warns of AI-driven love scams
description: A WEEK before Valentine’s Day, Sen. Sherwin Gatchalian warned the public to be vigilant against a more sophisticated wave of so-called “love scams,” which now use artificial intelligence (AI) and, in some cases, lead to the sexual exploitation of victims.

title: Security concerns, scepticism bursting bubble of Moltbook, viral AI social forum
description: Moltbook is a new "social network" built exclusively for AI agents to make posts and interact with each other, and humans are invited to observe. Elon Musk said its launch ushered in the "very early stages of the singularity " - or when artificial intelligence could surpass human intelligence.
